openGraph.title: FedExpress - Fast, Reliable Delivery Worldwide
openGraph.description: Ship packages worldwide with FedExpress. Fast delivery, real-time tracking, and 24/7 support.

common.deliveringExcellenceWorldwide: Delivering excellence worldwide with reliable, fast, and secure shipping services. Your trusted logistics partner since 1995.

home.shipYourPackagesWithConfidence: Ship your packages with confidence. Track in real-time, get expert support, and enjoy lightning-fast delivery to over 200 countries.
home.expressDeliveryWorldwide: Express delivery within 24-48 hours to major cities worldwide
home.trackYourPackageLive: Track your package every step of the way with live GPS updates
home.getExpertHelpAnytime: Get expert help anytime, anywhere with our dedicated support team
home.fullInsuranceCoverage: Full insurance coverage and secure handling for peace of mind
home.deliverToCountries: Deliver to 200+ countries with our extensive logistics network
home.onTimeDeliveryRate: 99.9% on-time delivery rate with money-back guarantee
home.weDeliverMoreThanPackages: We deliver more than packages – we deliver peace of mind with every shipment
home.FedExpressHasBeenIncrediblyReliable: FedExpress has been incredibly reliable for my business shipments. Fast delivery and excellent tracking system.
home.outstandingInternationalShippingService: Outstanding international shipping service. My packages always arrive on time and in perfect condition.
home.theCustomerSupportIsExceptional: The customer support is exceptional. They helped me resolve an issue quickly and professionally.
home.enterYourTrackingNumber: Enter your tracking number to get real-time updates on your shipment
home.ourTrackRecordSpeaksForItself: Our track record speaks for itself
home.realReviewsFromSatisfiedCustomers: Real reviews from satisfied customers around the world

about.startedWithAVision: Started with a vision to revolutionize package delivery worldwide
about.extendedServices: Extended services to 50+ countries across 5 continents
about.launchedRealTimeTracking: Launched real-time tracking and mobile app for customers
about.committedToCarbonNeutralDelivery: Committed to carbon-neutral delivery and eco-friendly practices
about.integratedSmartRouting: Integrated smart routing and predictive analytics for faster delivery
about.everyPackageHandledWithCare: Every package is handled with the utmost care and security protocols
about.weUnderstandTime: We understand time is precious and deliver on our promises
about.ourCustomersAreAtHeart: Our customers are at the heart of everything we do
about.alwaysImprovingOurServices: Always improving our services with cutting-edge technology
about.forOverYears: For over 25 years, FedExpress has been connecting people,businesses, and communities worldwide through fast, secure, and reliable delivery services. We don't just move packages – we deliver trust, speed, and peace of mind to millions of customers every day.
about.fromHumbleBeginnings: From humble beginnings to global leadership, here's how we've grown to become a trusted name in logistics.
about.thesePrinciplesGuideEverything: These principles guide everything we do and drive our commitment to excellence in every delivery.
about.meetTheVisionaries: Meet the visionaries driving FedExpress forward with innovation, integrity, and unwavering commitment to excellence.
about.buildACareerWithUs: Whether you're looking to build a career with us or partner with our services, we'd love to hear from you.

legal.reviewOurTerms: Review our terms and policies below.
legal.provideAccurateShippingInformation: By using FedExpress services, you agree to provide accurate shipping information, properly package items according to our guidelines, and comply with all applicable laws and regulations. You are responsible for ensuring that your shipments do not contain prohibited items.
legal.maintainConfidentialityAccountCredential: Users must maintain the confidentiality of their account credentials and notify us immediately of any unauthorized access. You agree to use our services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms.
legal.shippingAndLogisticsServicesLimitations: FedExpress provides shipping and logistics services subject to certain limitations. Delivery times are estimates and may vary due to weather, customs, or other factors beyond our control. We reserve the right to refuse service for prohibited items or destinations.
legal.liabilityForLostOrDamagedPackages: Our liability for lost or damaged packages is limited to the declared value or our standard coverage limits. Additional insurance may be purchased for high-value items.
legal.paymentIsDueAtTheTimeOfService: Payment is due at the time of service unless other arrangements have been made. We accept major credit cards, digital payments, and corporate accounts with approved credit terms. Late payments may incur additional fees.
legal.pricesAreSubjectToChange: Prices are subject to change based on fuel costs, regulatory changes, and other factors. Current rates are available on our website and through our customer service.
legal.liabilityIsLimitedToTheMaximumExtent: FedExpress's liability is limited to the maximum extent permitted by law. In case of disputes, we encourage resolution through our customer service team. Any legal proceedings must be filed within one year of the incident.
legal.theseTermsAreGoverned: These terms are governed by the laws of the jurisdiction where our headquarters are located. Any disputes will be resolved through binding arbitration.
legal.weCollectInformationNecessary: We collect information necessary to provide our shipping services, including sender and recipient details, package information, and payment data. We also collect usage data from our website and mobile applications to improve our services.
legal.informationCollected: Information collected may include names, addresses, phone numbers, email addresses, package contents, tracking preferences, and billing information. We may also collect device information and location data when using our mobile applications.
legal.yourInformationIsUsed: Your information is used to process shipments, provide tracking updates, process payments, and communicate with you about your services. We may also use data to improve our services, prevent fraud, and comply with legal requirements.
legal.weMaySendServiceRelatedCommunications: We may send you service-related communications, promotional materials (with your consent), and updates about our services. You can opt out of marketing communications at any time.
legal.youHaveTheRight: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You may also request data portability, restrict processing, or object to certain uses of your data. Contact our privacy team to exercise these rights.
legal.weWillRespondToYourRequests: We will respond to your requests within the timeframes required by applicable law. Some requests may require verification of your identity to protect your privacy.
legal.weUseCookies: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, remember your preferences, and analyze website usage. You can control cookies through your browser settings, though some features may not function properly if cookies are disabled.
legal.weMayShareData: We may share data with trusted partners who help us provide services, such as payment processors, analytics providers, and customer support platforms. These partners are contractually obligated to protect your information.
legal.ifYouhaveQuestions: If you have questions about these terms or policies, please contact our legal team.

services.fastReliableLocalShipping: Fast, reliable local shipping with guaranteed delivery times for urgent packages.
services.globalDeliveryWithCustomsClearance: Global delivery with customs clearance handled by our expert logistics team.
services.realTimeStatusUpdates: Real-time status updates for every shipment with detailed tracking information.
services.largeVolumeCargoSolutions: Large-volume cargo solutions for businesses with specialized handling and transport.
services.instantPickUpAndDelivery: Instant pickup and delivery in select cities for time-critical shipments.
services.fromLocalPackagesToInternationalFreight: From local packages to international freight, FedExpress handles it all with precision and care.
services.getStarted: Get started with our reliable shipping services today. Create your first shipment in minutes.

signup.tooManyAttempts: Too many attempts. Please wait and try again
signup.passwordShouldBeLong: Password should be at least 6 characters long

support.trackMyShipment: How do I track my shipment?
support.trackYourShipmentByEnteringYourTrackingN: You can track your shipment by entering your tracking number on our Track page. You'll receive real-time updates on your package location, delivery status, and estimated arrival time.
support.myPackageIsDelayed: What should I do if my package is delayed?
support.ifYourPackageIsDelayed: If your package is delayed, first check the tracking information for updates. Weather conditions, customs clearance, or high shipping volumes can cause delays. If your package is significantly overdue, contact our support team for assistance.
support.requestRefund: How do I request a refund?
support.ToRequestARefund: To request a refund, contact our customer service team with your tracking number and reason for the refund request. Refunds are typically processed within 5-7 business days once approved.
support.scheduleAPickup: How do I schedule a pickup?
support.youCanScheduleAPickup: You can schedule a pickup through our website or by calling our customer service. Provide your address, preferred pickup time, and package details. We offer same-day and next-day pickup options.
support.internationalShippingRestrictions: What are the international shipping restrictions?
support.internationalShippingRestrictionsVary: International shipping restrictions vary by destination country. Common restricted items include hazardous materials, perishable goods, and certain electronics. Check our shipping guidelines or contact support for specific restrictions.
support.shippingInsuranceProtectsYourPackageValu: Shipping insurance protects your package value in case of loss or damage. Insurance costs are based on the declared value of your shipment. Claims must be filed within 30 days of delivery date.
support.hereToAssist: We're here to assist with your shipments, tracking, and more.
support.noResultsFound: No results found for "{searchQuery}". Try a different search term.
support.readyToAssistYou: Our customer support team is ready to assist you
support.getDetailedHelpViaEmail: Get detailed help via email. We typically respond within 24 hours.
support.speakDirectlyWithOurSupportTeam: Speak directly with our support team for immediate assistance.
support.submitADetailedSupportRequest: Submit a detailed support request and we'll get back to you soon.

otpEmail.title: FedExpress Verification Code
otpEmail.codeIsReady: Your verification code is ready. For your security, we need to confirm your identity before proceeding.
otpEmail.returnToFedExpress: 1. Return to the FedExpress verification page
otpEmail.neverShare: Never share this code with anyone
otpEmail.willNeverAsk: FedExpress will never ask for this code via phone or email
otpEmail.contactUsImmediately: If you didn’t request this code, please contact us immediately
